author: Anthony T
title: The Melia La Defense Paris -
text: Wonderful hotel while working here in La Defense. And they will take your American Express, I was very disappointed to find out that almost every shop, restaurant in Paris refuse to take my Corporate Card. I have not found one yet that have turned down my Visa/MasterCard. This is just a heads up for any business travelers coming to Paris.
